title: Is We Dumb? | Bathtub. Alpaca. Helium. Heelys.
description:
Have you ever wished you could put the ashes of a deceased loved one inside a vibrator so you could screw yourself with it? Yikes. Let's talk about that, why in the hell bathtubs are so short, nearly blowing up a gas station trying to kill a spider, illegally starting an alpaca farm, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

*** IS WE DUMB? LIVE!!! | JUNE 10TH | TICKETS AT http://badmagicmerch.com ***

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/0K5y8m0NyYY
